Package jpass.ui.helper

Class FileHelper

java.lang.Object
jpass.ui.helper.FileHelper
public final class FileHelper
extends Object
Helper utils for file operations.

      saveAs - normal 'Save' dialog or 'Save as'

    • showFileChooser

      private static File showFileChooser​(JPassFrame parent, String taskName, String extension, String description)
      Shows a file chooser dialog.
      Parameters:
      parent - parent component
      taskName - name of the task
      extension - accepted file extension
      description - file extension description
      Returns:
      a file object

    • checkFileOverwrite

      private static boolean checkFileOverwrite​(String fileName, JPassFrame parent)
      Checks if overwrite is accepted.
      Parameters:
      fileName - file name
      parent - parent component
      Returns:
      true if overwrite is accepted; otherwise false

      Returns:
